line_text: The one his purple blood right well resembles;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The other his pale cheeks, methinks, presenteth:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Wither one rose, and let the other flourish;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: If you contend, a thousand lives must wither.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: How will my mother for a father's death
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Take on with me and ne'er be satisfied!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: How will my wife for slaughter of my son
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Shed seas of tears and ne'er be satisfied!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: How will the country for these woful chances
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Misthink the king and not be satisfied!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Was ever son so rued a father's death?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Was ever father so bemoan'd his son?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Was ever king so grieved for subjects' woe?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Much is your sorrow; mine ten times so much.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I'll bear thee hence, where I may weep my fill.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: These arms of mine shall be thy winding-sheet;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: My heart, sweet boy, shall be thy sepulchre,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For from my heart thine image ne'er shall go;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: My sighing breast shall be thy funeral bell;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And so obsequious will thy father be,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Even for the loss of thee, having no more,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: As Priam was for all his valiant sons.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I'll bear thee hence; and let them fight that will,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For I have murdered where I should not kill.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Sad-hearted men, much overgone with care,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Here sits a king more woful than you are.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Fly, father, fly! for all your friends are fled,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And Warwick rages like a chafed bull:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Away! for death doth hold us in pursuit.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Mount you, my lord; towards Berwick post amain:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Edward and Richard, like a brace of greyhounds
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Having the fearful flying hare in sight,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: With fiery eyes sparkling for very wrath,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And bloody steel grasp'd in their ireful hands,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Are at our backs; and therefore hence amain.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Away! for vengeance comes along with them:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Nay, stay not to expostulate, make speed;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Or else come after: I'll away before.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Nay, take me with thee, good sweet Exeter:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Not that I fear to stay, but love to go
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Whither the queen intends. Forward; away!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: 3 KING HENRY VI
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE V.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Here burns my candle out; ay, here it dies,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Which, whiles it lasted, gave King Henry light.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O Lancaster, I fear thy overthrow
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: More than my body's parting with my soul!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: My love and fear glued many friends to thee;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And, now I fall, thy tough commixture melts.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Impairing Henry, strengthening misproud York,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The common people swarm like summer flies;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And whither fly the gnats but to the sun?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And who shines now but Henry's enemies?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O Phoebus, hadst thou never given consent
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: That Phaethon should cheque thy fiery steeds,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Thy burning car never had scorch'd the earth!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And, Henry, hadst thou sway'd as kings should do,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Or as thy father and his father did,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Giving no ground unto the house of York,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: They never then had sprung like summer flies;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I and ten thousand in this luckless realm
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Had left no mourning widows for our death;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And thou this day hadst kept thy chair in peace.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For what doth cherish weeds but gentle air?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And what makes robbers bold but too much lenity?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Bootless are plaints, and cureless are my wounds;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: No way to fly, nor strength to hold out flight:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The foe is merciless, and will not pity;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For at their hands I have deserved no pity.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The air hath got into my deadly wounds,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And much effuse of blood doth make me faint.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Come, York and Richard, Warwick and the rest;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I stabb'd your fathers' bosoms, split my breast.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Now breathe we, lords: good fortune bids us pause,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And smooth the frowns of war with peaceful looks.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Some troops pursue the bloody-minded queen,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: That led calm Henry, though he were a king,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: As doth a sail, fill'd with a fretting gust,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Command an argosy to stem the waves.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But think you, lords, that Clifford fled with them?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: No, 'tis impossible he should escape,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For, though before his face I speak the words
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Your brother Richard mark'd him for the grave:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And wheresoe'er he is, he's surely dead.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Whose soul is that which takes her heavy leave?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: A deadly groan, like life and death's departing.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: See who it is: and, now the battle's ended,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: If friend or foe, let him be gently used.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Revoke that doom of mercy, for 'tis Clifford;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Who not contented that he lopp'd the branch
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: In hewing Rutland when his leaves put forth,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: But set his murdering knife unto the root
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: From whence that tender spray did sweetly spring,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I mean our princely father, Duke of York.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: From off the gates of York fetch down the head,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Your father's head, which Clifford placed there;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Instead whereof let this supply the room:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Measure for measure must be answered.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Bring forth that fatal screech-owl to our house,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: That nothing sung but death to us and ours:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Now death shall stop his dismal threatening sound,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And his ill-boding tongue no more shall speak.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I think his understanding is bereft.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Speak, Clifford, dost thou know who speaks to thee?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Dark cloudy death o'ershades his beams of life,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And he nor sees nor hears us what we say.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: O, would he did! and so perhaps he doth:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: 'Tis but his policy to counterfeit,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Because he would avoid such bitter taunts
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Which in the time of death he gave our father.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: If so thou think'st, vex him with eager words.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Clifford, ask mercy and obtain no grace.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Clifford, repent in bootless penitence.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Clifford, devise excuses for thy faults.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: While we devise fell tortures for thy faults.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Thou didst love York, and I am son to York.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Thou pitied'st Rutland; I will pity thee.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Where's Captain Margaret, to fence you now?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: They mock thee, Clifford: swear as thou wast wont.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: What, not an oath? nay, then the world goes hard
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: When Clifford cannot spare his friends an oath.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: I know by that he's dead; and, by my soul,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: If this right hand would buy two hour's life,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: That I in all despite might rail at him,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: This hand should chop it off, and with the
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: issuing blood
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Stifle the villain whose unstanched thirst
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: York and young Rutland could not satisfy.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Ay, but he's dead: off with the traitor's head,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And rear it in the place your father's stands.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And now to London with triumphant march,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: There to be crowned England's royal king:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: From whence shall Warwick cut the sea to France,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And ask the Lady Bona for thy queen:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: So shalt thou sinew both these lands together;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And, having France thy friend, thou shalt not dread
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: The scatter'd foe that hopes to rise again;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For though they cannot greatly sting to hurt,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Yet look to have them buzz to offend thine ears.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: First will I see the coronation;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And then to Brittany I'll cross the sea,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To effect this marriage, so it please my lord.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Even as thou wilt, sweet Warwick, let it be;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For in thy shoulder do I build my seat,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And never will I undertake the thing
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Wherein thy counsel and consent is wanting.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Richard, I will create thee Duke of Gloucester,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: And George, of Clarence: Warwick, as ourself,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Shall do and undo as him pleaseth best.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Let me be Duke of Clarence, George of Gloucester;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: For Gloucester's dukedom is too ominous.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Tut, that's a foolish observation:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Richard, be Duke of Gloucester. Now to London,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: To see these honours in possession.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: 3 KING HENRY VI
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE VI.  Another part of the field.

line_text: Under this thick-grown brake we'll shroud ourselves;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For through this laund anon the deer will come;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And in this covert will we make our stand,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Culling the principal of all the deer.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: I'll stay above the hill, so both may shoot.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: That cannot be; the noise of thy cross-bow
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Will scare the herd, and so my shoot is lost.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Here stand we both, and aim we at the best:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And, for the time shall not seem tedious,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: I'll tell thee what befell me on a day
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: In this self-place where now we mean to stand.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Here comes a man; let's stay till he be past.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: From Scotland am I stol'n, even of pure love,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To greet mine own land with my wishful sight.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No, Harry, Harry, 'tis no land of thine;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Thy place is fill'd, thy sceptre wrung from thee,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Thy balm wash'd off wherewith thou wast anointed:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No bending knee will call thee Caesar now,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No humble suitors press to speak for right,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No, not a man comes for redress of thee;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For how can I help them, and not myself?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Ay, here's a deer whose skin's a keeper's fee:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: This is the quondam king; let's seize upon him.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Let me embrace thee, sour adversity,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For wise men say it is the wisest course.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Why linger we? let us lay hands upon him.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Forbear awhile; we'll hear a little more.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: My queen and son are gone to France for aid;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And, as I hear, the great commanding Warwick
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Is thither gone, to crave the French king's sister
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To wife for Edward: if this news be true,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Poor queen and son, your labour is but lost;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For Warwick is a subtle orator,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And Lewis a prince soon won with moving words.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: By this account then Margaret may win him;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For she's a woman to be pitied much:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Her sighs will make a battery in his breast;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Her tears will pierce into a marble heart;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: The tiger will be mild whiles she doth mourn;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And Nero will be tainted with remorse,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To hear and see her plaints, her brinish tears.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Ay, but she's come to beg, Warwick to give;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: She, on his left side, craving aid for Henry,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: He, on his right, asking a wife for Edward.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: She weeps, and says her Henry is deposed;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: He smiles, and says his Edward is install'd;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: That she, poor wretch, for grief can speak no more;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Whiles Warwick tells his title, smooths the wrong,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Inferreth arguments of mighty strength,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And in conclusion wins the king from her,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: With promise of his sister, and what else,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To strengthen and support King Edward's place.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: O Margaret, thus 'twill be; and thou, poor soul,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Art then forsaken, as thou went'st forlorn!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Say, what art thou that talk'st of kings and queens?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: More than I seem, and less than I was born to:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: A man at least, for less I should not be;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And men may talk of kings, and why not I?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Ay, but thou talk'st as if thou wert a king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Why, so I am, in mind; and that's enough.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: But, if thou be a king, where is thy crown?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: My crown is in my heart, not on my head;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Not decked with diamonds and Indian stones,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Nor to be seen: my crown is called content:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: A crown it is that seldom kings enjoy.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Well, if you be a king crown'd with content,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Your crown content and you must be contented
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To go along with us; for as we think,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: You are the king King Edward hath deposed;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And we his subjects sworn in all allegiance
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Will apprehend you as his enemy.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: But did you never swear, and break an oath?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No, never such an oath; nor will not now.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Where did you dwell when I was King of England?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Here in this country, where we now remain.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: I was anointed king at nine months old;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: My father and my grandfather were kings,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And you were sworn true subjects unto me:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And tell me, then, have you not broke your oaths?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: No;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: For we were subjects but while you were king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Why, am I dead? do I not breathe a man?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Ah, simple men, you know not what you swear!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Look, as I blow this feather from my face,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And as the air blows it to me again,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Obeying with my wind when I do blow,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And yielding to another when it blows,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Commanded always by the greater gust;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Such is the lightness of you common men.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: But do not break your oaths; for of that sin
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: My mild entreaty shall not make you guilty.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: Go where you will, the king shall be commanded;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And be you kings, command, and I'll obey.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: We are true subjects to the king, King Edward.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: So would you be again to Henry,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: If he were seated as King Edward is.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: We charge you, in God's name, and the king's,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: To go with us unto the officers.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: In God's name, lead; your king's name be obey'd:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And what God will, that let your king perform;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

line_text: And what he will, I humbly yield unto.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  A forest in the north of England.

play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Have other some: why, 'tis a happy thing
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To be the father unto many sons.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Answer no more, for thou shalt be my queen.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: his shrift.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: 'twas for shift.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Brothers, you muse what chat we two have had.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The widow likes it not, for she looks very sad.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: You'll think it strange if I should marry her.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To whom, my lord?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, Clarence, to myself.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That would be ten days' wonder at the least.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That's a day longer than a wonder lasts.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: By so much is the wonder in extremes.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, jest on, brothers: I can tell you both
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Her suit is granted for her husband's lands.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My gracious lord, Henry your foe is taken,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And brought your prisoner to your palace gate.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See that he be convey'd unto the Tower:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And go we, brothers, to the man that took him,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To question of his apprehension.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Widow, go you along. Lords, use her honourably.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ay, Edward will use women honourably.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Would he were wasted, marrow, bones and all,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That from his loins no hopeful branch may spring,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To cross me from the golden time I look for!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And yet, between my soul's desire and me--
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The lustful Edward's title buried--
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Is Clarence, Henry, and his son young Edward,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And all the unlook'd for issue of their bodies,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To take their rooms, ere I can place myself:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: A cold premeditation for my purpose!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, then, I do but dream on sovereignty;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Like one that stands upon a promontory,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And spies a far-off shore where he would tread,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Wishing his foot were equal with his eye,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And chides the sea that sunders him from thence,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Saying, he'll lade it dry to have his way:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So do I wish the crown, being so far off;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so I chide the means that keeps me from it;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And so I say, I'll cut the causes off,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Flattering me with impossibilities.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: My eye's too quick, my heart o'erweens too much,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Unless my hand and strength could equal them.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Well, say there is no kingdom then for Richard;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: What other pleasure can the world afford?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll make my heaven in a lady's lap,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And deck my body in gay ornaments,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And witch sweet ladies with my words and looks.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O miserable thought! and more unlikely
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Than to accomplish twenty golden crowns!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, love forswore me in my mother's womb:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, for I should not deal in her soft laws,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: She did corrupt frail nature with some bribe,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To shrink mine arm up like a wither'd shrub;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To make an envious mountain on my back,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where sits deformity to mock my body;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To shape my legs of an unequal size;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: To disproportion me in every part,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Like to a chaos, or an unlick'd bear-whelp
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That carries no impression like the dam.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And am I then a man to be beloved?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O monstrous fault, to harbour such a thought!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Then, since this earth affords no joy to me,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But to command, to cheque, to o'erbear such
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: As are of better person than myself,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll make my heaven to dream upon the crown,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, whiles I live, to account this world but hell,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Until my mis-shaped trunk that bears this head
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Be round impaled with a glorious crown.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And yet I know not how to get the crown,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: For many lives stand between me and home:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And I,--like one lost in a thorny wood,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That rends the thorns and is rent with the thorns,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Seeking a way and straying from the way;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Not knowing how to find the open air,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: But toiling desperately to find it out,--
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Torment myself to catch the English crown:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And from that torment I will free myself,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Or hew my way out with a bloody axe.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Why, I can smile, and murder whiles I smile,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And cry 'Content' to that which grieves my heart,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And wet my cheeks with artificial tears,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And frame my face to all occasions.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll drown more sailors than the mermaid shall;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll slay more gazers than the basilisk;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll play the orator as well as Nestor,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Deceive more slily than Ulysses could,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And, like a Sinon, take another Troy.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I can add colours to the chameleon,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Change shapes with Proteus for advantages,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And set the murderous Machiavel to school.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Can I do this, and cannot get a crown?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Tut, were it farther off, I'll pluck it down.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: 3 KING HENRY VI
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Fair Queen of England, worthy Margaret,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Sit down with us: it ill befits thy state
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And birth, that thou shouldst stand while Lewis doth sit.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: No, mighty King of France: now Margaret
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Must strike her sail and learn awhile to serve
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Where kings command. I was, I must confess,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Great Albion's queen in former golden days:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: But now mischance hath trod my title down,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And with dishonour laid me on the ground;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Where I must take like seat unto my fortune,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And to my humble seat conform myself.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Why, say, fair queen, whence springs this deep despair?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: From such a cause as fills mine eyes with tears
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And stops my tongue, while heart is drown'd in cares.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Whate'er it be, be thou still like thyself,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And sit thee by our side:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Yield not thy neck
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To fortune's yoke, but let thy dauntless mind
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Still ride in triumph over all mischance.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Be plain, Queen Margaret, and tell thy grief;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: It shall be eased, if France can yield relief.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Those gracious words revive my drooping thoughts
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And give my tongue-tied sorrows leave to speak.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Now, therefore, be it known to noble Lewis,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That Henry, sole possessor of my love,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Is of a king become a banish'd man,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And forced to live in Scotland a forlorn;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: While proud ambitious Edward Duke of York
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Usurps the regal title and the seat
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Of England's true-anointed lawful king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: This is the cause that I, poor Margaret,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: With this my son, Prince Edward, Henry's heir,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Am come to crave thy just and lawful aid;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And if thou fail us, all our hope is done:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Scotland hath will to help, but cannot help;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Our people and our peers are both misled,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Our treasures seized, our soldiers put to flight,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And, as thou seest, ourselves in heavy plight.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Renowned queen, with patience calm the storm,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: While we bethink a means to break it off.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: The more we stay, the stronger grows our foe.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: The more I stay, the more I'll succor thee.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: O, but impatience waiteth on true sorrow.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And see where comes the breeder of my sorrow!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: What's he approacheth boldly to our presence?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Our Earl of Warwick, Edward's greatest friend.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Welcome, brave Warwick! What brings thee to France?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Ay, now begins a second storm to rise;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: For this is he that moves both wind and tide.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: From worthy Edward, King of Albion,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: My lord and sovereign, and thy vowed friend,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I come, in kindness and unfeigned love,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: First, to do greetings to thy royal person;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And then to crave a league of amity;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And lastly, to confirm that amity
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: With a nuptial knot, if thou vouchsafe to grant
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That virtuous Lady Bona, thy fair sister,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To England's king in lawful marriage.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I am commanded, with your leave and favour,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Humbly to kiss your hand, and with my tongue
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To tell the passion of my sovereign's heart;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Where fame, late entering at his heedful ears,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Hath placed thy beauty's image and thy virtue.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: King Lewis and Lady Bona, hear me speak,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Before you answer Warwick. His demand
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Springs not from Edward's well-meant honest love,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: But from deceit bred by necessity;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: For how can tyrants safely govern home,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Unless abroad they purchase great alliance?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To prove him tyrant this reason may suffice,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That Henry liveth still: but were he dead,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Yet here Prince Edward stands, King Henry's son.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Look, therefore, Lewis, that by this league and marriage
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Thou draw not on thy danger and dishonour;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: For though usurpers sway the rule awhile,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Yet heavens are just, and time suppresseth wrongs.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Injurious Margaret!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And why not queen?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Because thy father Henry did usurp;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And thou no more are prince than she is queen.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Then Warwick disannuls great John of Gaunt,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Which did subdue the greatest part of Spain;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And, after John of Gaunt, Henry the Fourth,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Whose wisdom was a mirror to the wisest;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And, after that wise prince, Henry the Fifth,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Who by his prowess conquered all France:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: From these our Henry lineally descends.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Oxford, how haps it, in this smooth discourse,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: You told not how Henry the Sixth hath lost
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: All that which Henry Fifth had gotten?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Methinks these peers of France should smile at that.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: But for the rest, you tell a pedigree
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Of threescore and two years; a silly time
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To make prescription for a kingdom's worth.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Why, Warwick, canst thou speak against thy liege,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Whom thou obeyed'st thirty and six years,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And not bewray thy treason with a blush?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Can Oxford, that did ever fence the right,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Now buckler falsehood with a pedigree?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: For shame! leave Henry, and call Edward king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Call him my king by whose injurious doom
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: My elder brother, the Lord Aubrey Vere,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Was done to death? and more than so, my father,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Even in the downfall of his mellow'd years,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: When nature brought him to the door of death?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: No, Warwick, no; while life upholds this arm,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: This arm upholds the house of Lancaster.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And I the house of York.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Queen Margaret, Prince Edward, and Oxford,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Vouchsafe, at our request, to stand aside,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: While I use further conference with Warwick.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Heavens grant that Warwick's words bewitch him not!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Now Warwick, tell me, even upon thy conscience,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Is Edward your true king? for I were loath
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To link with him that were not lawful chosen.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Thereon I pawn my credit and mine honour.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: But is he gracious in the people's eye?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: The more that Henry was unfortunate.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Then further, all dissembling set aside,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Tell me for truth the measure of his love
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Unto our sister Bona.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Such it seems
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: As may beseem a monarch like himself.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Myself have often heard him say and swear
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That this his love was an eternal plant,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Whereof the root was fix'd in virtue's ground,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: The leaves and fruit maintain'd with beauty's sun,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Exempt from envy, but not from disdain,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Unless the Lady Bona quit his pain.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Now, sister, let us hear your firm resolve.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Your grant, or your denial, shall be mine:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Yet I confess that often ere this day,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: When I have heard your king's desert recounted,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Mine ear hath tempted judgment to desire.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Then, Warwick, thus: our sister shall be Edward's;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And now forthwith shall articles be drawn
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Touching the jointure that your king must make,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Which with her dowry shall be counterpoised.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Draw near, Queen Margaret, and be a witness
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That Bona shall be wife to the English king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: To Edward, but not to the English king.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Deceitful Warwick! it was thy device
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: By this alliance to make void my suit:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Before thy coming Lewis was Henry's friend.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And still is friend to him and Margaret:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: But if your title to the crown be weak,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: As may appear by Edward's good success,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Then 'tis but reason that I be released
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: From giving aid which late I promised.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Yet shall you have all kindness at my hand
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: That your estate requires and mine can yield.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Henry now lives in Scotland at his ease,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Where having nothing, nothing can he lose.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And as for you yourself, our quondam queen,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: You have a father able to maintain you;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And better 'twere you troubled him than France.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Peace, impudent and shameless Warwick, peace,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Proud setter up and puller down of kings!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I will not hence, till, with my talk and tears,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Both full of truth, I make King Lewis behold
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Thy sly conveyance and thy lord's false love;
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: For both of you are birds of selfsame feather.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Warwick, this is some post to us or thee.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Sent from your brother, Marquess Montague:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: These from our king unto your majesty:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And, madam, these for you; from whom I know not.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I like it well that our fair queen and mistress
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Smiles at her news, while Warwick frowns at his.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Nay, mark how Lewis stamps, as he were nettled:
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I hope all's for the best.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Warwick, what are thy news? and yours, fair queen?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Mine, such as fill my heart with unhoped joys.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Mine, full of sorrow and heart's discontent.
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: What! has your king married the Lady Grey!
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: And now, to soothe your forgery and his,
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Sends me a paper to persuade me patience?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Is this the alliance that he seeks with France?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: Dare he presume to scorn us in this manner?
play_title_long: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE III.  France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.

line_text: I told your majesty as much before:
